levels.description:
<@ba.rem>Can switch between the original state and the following state:</>
Range <@ba.vdown>reduces</>; DEF <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</>; Restores HP by <@ba.vup>{HP_RECOVERY_PER_SEC_BY_MAX_HP_RATIO:0.0%}</> of Max HP per second
